transcript:
but he also felt that on what he said now his future depended wheth- er he would follow the same old road, or that new path so attractively shown him by the Ma- sons, on which he firmly believed he would be reborn to a new life. 
"Now, dear boy," said Prince Vasili playful- ly, "say 'yes,' and I'll write to her myself, and we will kill the fatted calf." 
But before Prince Vasili had finished his playful speech, Pierre, without looking at him, and with a kind of fury that made him like his fat
